Study Measures

This is an outline of all study procedures.

Intake Day

  • CAPA (Clinical interview stored on Axis, diagnosis stored on Oracle)
    • Timeline
    • Demos
    • SES (Collateral only)
    • Medical History (Collateral only)
    • ADHD (long)
    • Depression (long)
    • Mania (long)
    • SIPS
    • Suicide (long)
    • PTSD (long)
    • Other disorders
    • Cornblatt Social
    • Cornblatt Role
    • FIGS (Collateral only)
    • FIGS Checklists: Psychosis
    • SIPS GAF
    • Schizotypal Checklist
    • Additional Case Documents
  • LiBI CNB (WebCNP database)
    • WRAT4: Wide Range Reading Assessment
    • MPRACT: Motor Praxis Test
    • MEDF36: Measured Emotion Differentiation Test
    • KSPVRT: Penn Verbal Reasoning Test
    • CPF_A: Penn Face Memory Test
    • ER40_D: Penn Emotion Recognition Test for Children
    • SLNB2: Short Letter N Back Test
    • k-CPW: Penn Word Memory Test
    • ADT36: Age Differentiation Test
    • VSPLOT15: Penn Line Orientation Test
    • SVOLT_A: Visual Object Learning Test
    • PMAT24_A: Penn Matrix Analysis Test
    • SPCPTNL: Short Penn Continuous Performance Task
    • k-PCET_A: Penn Conditional Exclusion Test for Children
    • sCTAP: Short Computerized Finger-Tapping Test

Imaging Day

  • Imaging Data (Flywheel)
    • fracback Scanner Task (.log stored at acquisition level on Flywheel)
    • PMU Data (stored as DICOM at session level on Flywheel)
  • EF CNB (WebCNP database)
    • AIM: Abstraction Inhibition and Working Memory Test
    • DIGSYM: Digit Symbol Test
    • Trails A: Trails Task - Part A
    • Trails B: Trails Task - Part B
    • KDDISC: Penn Delay Discounting Task
    • KRIDISC: Penn Risc Discounting Task
    • EDT: Penn Effort Discounting Task
  • Variability Battery (.zip stored at session level on Flywheel)
    • Dominant
    • Reaction
    • CPT
    • CPT_Gordon
    • simple_processing
    • complex_processing
    • complex_reasoning
  • Self Report (Axis)
    • ALES: Adverse Life Experiences Scale; Ferguson, Matthews, & Cox, 2010; PDF
    • ALS-18 (only T1): Affective Lability Scale; Contardi et al., 2018; PDF
    • ARI (collateral and proband): Affective Reactivity Index; Stringaris et al., 2012; PDFs: Proband, Collateral
    • ASRM (only T1): Altman Selfrating Mania Scale; Altman, Hedeker, Peterson, & Davis, 1997; PDF
    • BDI-1A (age 13 and older): Beck Depression Inventory; Beck et al., 1961; PDF
    • BDI-1A Child (up till age 13): Beck Depression Inventory; Beck et al., 1961; PDF
    • BIS-BAS Child: Behavioral Inhibition/Activation System; Carver, & White, 1994; PDF
    • E-SWAN ADHD (collateral and proband); Swanson et al., 2012; PDFs: Proband, Collateral
    • E-SWAN DMDD (collateral and proband, only T1); Alexander et al., 2017; PDFs: Proband, Collateral
    • MAPS-SR: The Motivation and Pleasure Scale - Self-Report; LLerena et al. 2013; PDF
    • PANAS (child, only T1): Positive and Negative Affect Schedule; Watson, Clark, & Tellegen 1988; PDF
    • PPA: PROMIS Pediatric Anxiety; PDF
    • PRIME Screen (self-report); PDF
    • RPAS (only T1): Revised Physical Anhedonia Scale; Weinstein et al., [2011]; PDF
    • RSAS (only T1): Revised Social Anhedonia Scale; Weinstein et al., [2011]; PDF
    • Substance Use Questionnaire; PDF
    • Tanner boy/girl; PDFs: Female, Male
    • Wolf IM/EM Short; PDF

Additional information about data and where it’s stored, as per 10/04/2021

Link to dynamic spreadsheet
